pages.text: $(li)The Roadrunner Feather is an item that can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/falconry_hood)Falconry Hood$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:armors/roadrunner_boots)Roadrunner Boots$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can only be dropped by a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/roadrunner)Roadrunner$(/l) upon death.
